descriptions.description: This file contains the merged and preprocessed reviews.

subjects.subject: text: A column containing the review text data.
rating: A column containing the rating of the review. (discrete values, 1-5)
source: A column containing the source of the review ("GP" or "Amazon").
cleaned_text: A column containing the text data after removing the stopwords.
predicted_rating: A column containing the caluclated, predicted rating for the review. (continuous values, 1-5)
category: A column containing the category of each review ("good" or "bad").
predicted_category: A column containing the predicted category for each review ("good" or "bad").
predicted_rating_discrete: A column containing the discretized predicted rating for each review (discrete values, 1-5).
